alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Ray (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 9:10PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Ray and southern Caldwell Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 909 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Polo, or 11 miles northeast of Lawson, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Braymer, Polo, Kingston, Cowgill, Elmira and Knoxville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for north central, northwestern and west central Missouri.
